name: https://www.bolfoods.com/
slogan: Leading the market in fresh, plant-based, healthy meals
description:
Our 100% plant-powered range includes Veg Pots, Dinner Boxes, Salad Jars and Super Soups. We pride ourselves in innovating great recipes and paving the way in sustainability.

Veg Pots
Ancient whole grains, beans & pulses are topped with fresh vegetables and brought together with a tasty sauce from our favourite regions. Each recipe delivers serious flavour with a good health kick.

Dinner Boxes
A delicious plant-based twists on classic UK favourites. Four tasty recipes, with up to 3 of your 5-a-day. When you are looking for a meal with a great source of protein and don’t have time to cook from scratch

Salad Jars
A tasty combination of hearty grains, beans, pulses, chargrilled, roasted & raw veg are topped with our fresh home-made dressings. For ultimate convenience, shake & eat straight from the jar.

Super Soups
Plant-powered, tasting incredible and delivering multiple nutritional benefits. Whether it’s an energy, protein or immune boost you're after, we've got a soup for you.
